attributes.review: I opened this app and it immediately asked me to allow notifications. Does trump not care about my privacy? I do not want to be bombarded every minute of every day. Then it asked me for my phone number. I am a young woman and I do not want to be contacted by someone I don’t know. Absolutely disgusting. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see what this cheeto man wanted to do in the future but it just hacked my phone and keeps making it glitch. Now I had to buy a new phone and waste my time. You will be hearing from my lawyer and I want to speak to the manager of this app!
attributes.title: it hacked my phone

attributes.review: This app is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded in my life and I’ve literally grown up with iPhones so that should be saying a lot 😷 With that being said I don’t know what I expected from a dude who can’t make coherent sentences. Take this thing off the AppStore so no one else has to suffer ✨🧚🏼😇
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: when i open that app i just see a Oompa Loompa hold his fist up like he does anything to support BLM. Anyways it ask me if i want to help trump win😑trynna be slick...no. He has an event latinos for Trump or sum like that buttttt i hope y’all know that he’s the one that brought back ICE tf. He makes all his supporters look stupid and ignorant like himself😊
attributes.title: ew

attributes.review: This app caused my whole family to die! My dog fell down 39 flights of stairs and landed on my obese bunny rabbit! My brother and father are so many oranges they had to go to the ER because when they went to the toilet they couldn’t get off and then had to get pried off with a crowbar and chainsaw! MY MOM WHEN TO TRUMPS RALLY AND CAME BACK WITH ALL HER BRAIN CELLS MISSING! PLS SHUT DOWN THIS APP!
attributes.title: THIS APP KILLED MY FAMILY 😭

attributes.review: This took my 12 year old son from having fun cause he says TikTok is dumb now according to you. But we dont go down without a fight. Cause you saying tiktok bad but this app took my private information outta my account and every where else and now Im losing money as the day goes by.
attributes.title: Nasty

attributes.review: This might officially be one of the worst apps ever! Lags so much and when I came back from walking my fish my whole phone froze, i’ve never had this problem up until I download this app. Definitely deserves to get removed from the app store.
attributes.title: No bueno

attributes.review: I expected a highly professional app due to this person being our president and a running candidate for presidency for 2020, but it was anything but that. It just was another platform for Donald to talk crap and be petty. Also the app is super slow, and crashes all the time. HATE IT!!
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: This app was just all around disappointing, I had to open the app and see this orange cheeto lookin thing, and it did NOT make my day to say the least. His plans for the election are just all around disappointing and sad. If i could give this app 0 ⭐️ then I would. 🧚🏻‍♀️💫🌸☺️Don’t recommend.☺️🧚🏻‍♀️💫🌸
attributes.title: DREADful

attributes.review: This app did not get me a meeting with Donnie. I thought by getting the app and being informed he’d notice me, but instead I have been bombarded with phone calls and texts, that I thought were from HIM, that are just eager people trying to fake being him. It’s not fair. I want to meet HIM.
attributes.title: Terrible
